author: Staff Reporter
text: Sulur Police on Friday arrested K. Sreenivasalu on charges of trespassing in to the Sulur Air Force base. The Police said that Wing Commander Murugan, who is at the station security office, found a person loitering inside the prohibited area of the base. He and his men nabbed the person and on inquiry identified him as Sreenivasalu. The Air Force men then handed over Sreenivasalu to them, the Police said and added that on further inquiry, they learnt that he was from Telangana. The Police also found him to be mentally unstable. Based on the complaint the Police arrested him.
title: Intruder held
